entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
